props.name: children
props.docblock: represents the CheckBox components defined within the CheckBoxGroup component and is not a specific named prop that needs to be passed in. At least one CheckBox must be defined within the group. Example: `<CheckBoxGroup><CheckBox .../></CheckBoxGroup>`

description.text: represents the CheckBox components defined within the CheckBoxGroup component and is not a specific named prop that needs to be passed in. At least one CheckBox must be defined within the group. Example: `<CheckBoxGroup><CheckBox .../></CheckBoxGroup>`

frontmatter.title: CheckboxGroup
frontmatter.notes: Refactor to use Input component and refresh checkbox designs
